name: Paradoxical (The Last Minute Men)
description:
If you're stuck in a time loop of reoccurring logic, how are you supposed to escape? Simple, just break logic, create a paradox that spits in the face of conventional thinking. Paradoxical is a small prototype puzzle platformer where your objective is to break out of the levels time loop by creating the paradox shown to you.

Cameron Manges & Daniel Ellis - Art asset designers

Bailey Angus - Gameplay Developer
